page.title: 08ST DENYS CHURCH
page.content:
ST. DENY'S CHURCH IS SITUATED ON THE EDGE OF THE MARKET PLACE . ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF THE CHURCH THERE ARE SHOPS : THE BUTCHERS ,SWEETSHOP ,A RESTAURANT AND A T.S.B. BANK. IN THE MIDDLE OF THE MARKET PLACE THERE IS A MONUMENT TO COMMERATE THE PEOPLE WHO DIED IN THE WARS. TWICE A WEEK THE MARKET IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC TO BUY OR SELL THINGS LIKE EAR-RINGS,DOG FOOD ,FRUIT,SOCKS,BOOKS,FISH,VEGTABLES,PLAN TS etc. WHEN THE MARKET ISN'T OPEN IT IS USED AS A CAR PARK. TREES SEPARATE THE MARKET PLACE FROM THE PAVEMENT.
{BY. KIT YEE WONG (AGE 13) {
